alert.note: Alert for Cuyahoga; Geauga; Lake (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Lake Effect Snow Warning issued January 07 at 10:46PM EST until January 08 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...LAKE EFFECT SNOW WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Lake effect snow. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to locally 3 inches, bringing snow totals of 4 to 12 inches in the most-persistent snow bands. * WHERE...Lake, Geauga and Cuyahoga counties. * WHEN...Until 7 AM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions and reduced visibility at times. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Lake effect snow bands are expected to set up from near downtown Cleveland to South Euclid to Chesterfield, shifting north towards Willoughby Hills and Kirtland overnight. Experimental content below...do not use operationally. To view the experimental polygons please see: http://www.weather.gov/buf/lespolygon COORD...4152 8106 4154 8130 4156 8130 4162 8150 4152 8166 4149 8184 4142 8173 4138 8120 4139 8106 4148 8102 TIME Y22M01D08T0200Z-Y22M01D08T1200Z
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
